      • createJettyDump

        public Ok createJettyDump(RestRequest req,
                          RestResponse res)
                   throws Exception
        [POST /jetty/dump] - Generates and saves the jetty thread dump file to jetty-thread-dump.log.
        Parameters:
        req - The request.
        res - The response.
        Returns:
        The thread dump contents.
        Throws:
        Exception - Gets converted to 500 response.
